author: iammpalm3165
content: Does anyone know how to get 32+ Goerli ETH to test through the Goerli / Prater merge?  I had a good samaratin give me Ropsten ETH to allow testing running a validator there which was great.  The faucets all are very laborious to get test ETH.  Thanks for any help!
